 @Produces(value="application/xml")
public Pizza pizzaShops(@QueryParam(value="clientId")

        Insert a pizza to for the sell of the client
        Parameters:
        clientId - of the sale fixed for either client
        productId - of the pizza
        numberOfSlices - that is defined by the client
        size - size for the pizza
        optionalIngredientsId - that is defined by the client
